title: r/Choosingbeggars "My Bf Only Bought Me a $700 Purse! Should I Dump Him?"
description:
r/Choosingbeggars In today's episode, a spoiled and entitled woman goes online to complain that her boyfriend ONLY bought her a $700 purse. That's not enough! She wants a $1000 every purse, or else her boyfriend is a stingy deadbeat! She wants to know if she should dump her boyfriend for spending such little money on her every month. What do you think? If you like this podcast and want to see more, hit the follow button for more daily Reddit content!
